DOC.detailed_description: This study multicenter , double-blind , randomize , Cinacalcet hydrochloride-controlled , parallel-group , dose-ascending study . Subjects judge eligible registered randomize either ASP7991 group ( receive ASP7991 cinacalcet-placebo ) Cinacalcet group ( receive cinacalcet ASP7991-placebo ) , receive 12-week ( 84 day ) administration study drug first dialysis day week ( treatment period ) , double-blind manner . The dose study drug increase every 3 week dose-ascending manner . Follow-up assessment perform start first dialysis week , 1 week ( 7 day ) completion treatment period .
